Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params._maxDepositAmount: maximum USDC amount that caller deposits

returns.finalDepositMargin: USDC amount that caller actually deposits

depositForPositionInitialization(uint256.details: The function can be called by owner.

getPrice(uint256).details: The function should not be called on chain.

setHedger(address).details: Only operator can call this function.

setOperator(address).details: Only operator can call this function.

params._minWithdrawAmount: minimum USDC amount that caller deposits

returns.finalWithdrawAmount: USDC amount that caller actually withdraws

deposit(uint256,uint256,address,uint256,.notice: Deposits margin and mints strategy token.

execDeltaHedge(uint256,(uint256,uint256,.notice: Hedger can call the delta hedging function if the price has changed by a set ratio from the last price at the hedging or time has elapsed by a set interval since the last hedge time.

getPrice(uint256).notice: Gets price of strategy token by USDC.

updateHedgePriceThreshold(uint256,uint25.notice: Updates price threshold for delta hedging.

withdraw(uint256,uint256,address,int256,.notice: Withdraws margin and burns strategy token.

userdoc.notice: Error Codes GSS0: already initialized GSS1: not initialized GSS2: required margin amount must be less than maximum GSS3: withdrawn margin amount must be greater than minimum GSS4: invalid leverage GSS5: caller must be Controller
